reviewText:
A group of hard partying wild girls from mainly working class Britain(some described as feral) , some are strippers , some tend to aggression, go to an old fashioned finishing school Eccleston Hall. and we see who can be great viewing both as a window into the lives of young people in contemporary Britain. And the amazing true life transformations of three of the girls in each episode - a real life modern My Fair Lady. Most of the girls are quite likable, and some were truly rough diamonds, as these not suited for transformation were shifted out and expelled before the lucky three were chosen.
Mild nudity and some volatile behaviour
I wish it was available on DVD cause I would buy it!
